topic.title: Changing bucket authentication
topic.shortdesc: To change bucket authentication use the POST operation with the /pools/default/buckets/acache authType URI.

body.p: Changing a bucket from port-based authentication to SASL authentication is achieved by changing the active bucket configuration.
body.note: When changing the active bucket configuration, specify the existing configuration parameters and the changed authentication parameters in the request.
body.p: POST authType is used with the /pools/default/buckets/acache URI.
body.codeblock: curl -X POST -u admin:password -d ramQuotaMB=130 -d authType=sasl \ -d saslPassword=letmein \ http://localhost:8091/pools/default/buckets/acache
body.p: Replace the admin, password, localhost, 130, letmein, and acache values in the above example with your actual values.
